thread.title: BRIEF-Avista Healthcare Says Co, Envigo Entered Into Mutual Termination Agreement

title: BRIEF-Avista Healthcare Says Co, Envigo Entered Into Mutual Termination Agreement
text: February 14, 2018 / 2:42 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Avista Healthcare Says Co, Envigo Entered Into Mutual Termination Agreement Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Avista Healthcare Public Acquisition Corp : * AVISTA HEALTHCARE PUBLIC ACQUISITION SAYS CO, ENVIGO ENTERED INTO MUTUAL TERMINATION AGREEMENT - SEC FILING * AVISTA HEALTHCARE PUBLIC ACQUISITION - TRANSACTION AGREEMENT BETWEEN CO AND ENVIGO WAS TERMINATED EFFECTIVE AS OF FEB 14, 2018 * AVISTA HEALTHCARE PUBLIC ACQUISITION - INTENDS TO CONTINUE TO PURSUE A BUSINESS COMBINATION Source text: ( bit.ly/2EGhUUI ) Further company coverage:
